Frequently Asked Questions

Do I need technical expertise to use Kite?

Not at all! Kite is designed to be user-friendly for church staff of all technical levels. Our platform comes with an intuitive dashboard and pre-built templates specifically designed for churches. We also provide comprehensive onboarding and support to help you get started quickly.

For more complex customizations, our team is always available to assist you, or you can choose a plan with dedicated support.

Can I migrate my existing church website to Kite?

Absolutely! We offer seamless migration services to help transition your existing church website to the Kite platform. Our team will work with you to ensure that your content, design elements, and functionality are preserved during the migration process.

We can also help you enhance your existing content with Kite's powerful features like event management, sermon archives, and online giving integration.

How does the payment processing work?

Kite integrates with popular payment processors like Stripe and PayPal to provide secure and reliable donation processing for your church. We handle all the technical aspects of payment processing, including security compliance and transaction management.

Your congregation can easily make one-time or recurring donations, and you'll receive detailed reports on all transactions. Our system charges a standard processing fee of 2.9% + $0.30 per transaction, which is the industry standard.

Is there a limit to how many events we can create?

There are no limits on the number of events you can create with Kite! Whether you're managing weekly services, special events, community outreach programs, or small group meetings, our platform can handle it all.

Our advanced event management system includes features like registration, attendance tracking, calendar integration, and automated reminders to help you organize and promote your church events effectively.

Can I customize the design to match our church's branding?

Yes! Kite provides extensive customization options to ensure your digital presence aligns perfectly with your church's unique branding. You can easily customize colors, fonts, layouts, and more using our intuitive Bricks Builder interface.

For churches on the Growth or Ministry plans, we also offer custom design services to help you create a truly unique online presence that reflects your church's identity and mission.
